bio: Being Inspirited by this extremely rare Yo-kai will let you transcend mere winning and losing.

soultimate.name: Platinum Guard
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Defense by 350% for 30 seconds
soultimate.description: Defense greatly increased, and foes focus on you.

skill.effect: Reduces Water, Ice & Wind Element damage.
skill.name: Platinum Guard

name: Castelius Max
